subject: Re: Thanks, we are ready to lend money
body:
Your credit does not matter to us!
 
If your family OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE ready money to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your entire payment by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this tender will expire TODAY):
 
$241,000+ debt
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest payments!
 
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this elementary form... 
 
Do not worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
 
http://warltqrend.com/
